short_summary: RISO for the purchase of Miscellaneous Grocery Products for CSC Housing Units - Period 4
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on January 3 2024. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), is issuing this Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the acquisition and delivery of miscellaneous grocery products for CSC’s Housing Units located in the province of Québec, Canada (Region 1: Laval; Region 2 – Ste-Anne-des-Plaines; Region 3 – Cowansville), as detailed in the Solicitation Documents.
duration_in_months: If no obvious error exists with this solicitation so given the nature of this RFSO, the Professional Services and Procurement Branch states that the RFSO will automatically be deemed to be incomplete, if no response is received from interested suppliers within 30 working days. In such cases, the RFSO will thus be cancelled and no contract will be awarded.
full_summary:
Tdépartement of Public Works and Government Services# Request for Standing OfferBid Title: Miscellaneous Grocery Products for CSC Housing Units (Period 4)

Solicitation Documents:
Section 1: Request for Standing Offer Notice
The Solicitation Documents provide details on the requirements and specifications for the acquisition and delivery of miscellaneous grocery products for CSC's Housing Units.

* Date: December 19, 2023
* Deadline for bid submission: January 3, 2024, at 14:00 HAE
* Location of bid opening: PWGSC Contracting Depot
* Delivery regions:
	+ Laval
	+ Ste-Anne-des-Plaines
	+ Cowansville

The bidder must be a supplier as per the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

Key Tender Information:
Bidders required to select at least one procurement category from:
**50100000 - Nuts and seeds
**50111500 - Minimally processed meat and poultry products
**50111600 - Organic minimally processed meat and poultry products
**50111700 - Non-GMO minimally processed meat and poultry products
...
الم Unified Classified and Coding System (UCS) CPC category codes specified are:

**50100000 - Fruits, nuts, seeds and grains
**50201700 - Coffee, tea and spices
**50340000 - Milk and dairy products
...
 Ngành type Standing Offer

Submissions by all other types of procurements (e.g., RFP, RFQ, BO, etc.) will not be accepted.
